heading: Tuesday Night
text: Brief periods of heavy snow possible early, then tapering to snow showers overnight. Totals by morning from 3 to 6 inches, locally higher in the mountains and in the St. Lawrence Valley, and locally lower in southern valleys. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, some mid teens far north. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph and diminishing.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Brief periods of heavy snow possible early, then tapering to snow showers overnight. Totals by morning from 3 to 6 inches, locally higher in the mountains and in the St. Lawrence Valley, and locally lower in southern valleys. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, some mid teens far north. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph and diminishing.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, except likely in the mountains, mainly north, with another 1 to 3 inches there. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in southern valleys. Winds becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, except likely in the mountains, mainly north, with another 1 to 3 inches there. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in southern valleys. Winds becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. A few lingering snow showers north, mainly over high terrain. Lows in the mid to upper teens, around 10 above in the far north. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
